span.span:
SHSD regrets that Bedwell's playground, the tennis courts, and all district fields
(including the high school track) are closed and off limits until further notice.

br.a: District's Anti-Bullying Bill of Rights Grade

Folder Sign Up

div.p: The Somerset Hills School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district’s activities and programs. Somerset Hills School District also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
